turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you get me a drink from Starbucks? I need the caffeine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah! Which Starbucks do you want me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 20th Street South in Birmingham, I think they always make my coffee the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the biggest size? The trenta, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, the trenta is a little bigger than a venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then yes, a trenta for sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a regular iced coffee, nothing too fancy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you take it with cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm lactose intolerant, so I get it with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yes, tell them to replace their classic sweetener syrup with 4 packets of Splenda. I'm trying to keep my calories down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know I just said I was counting calories, but I actually do really want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a trenta iced coffee, replace classic syrup with 4 packets of Splenda, with soy milk, add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, perfect. But also add some caramel syrup, too, on top. Do you want anything? You can order yourself something if you want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No thank you, I've already had enough coffee for the day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, then that's all!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I ordered your drink at the Starbucks on 20th Street S, and it'll be ready soon. They'll send your receipt to your cell phone in case you need it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you so much! I can't wait to drink all that coffee.
